CRAN statistics

2024-09-30

Source: vignettes/cran-statistics.Rmd
cran-statistics.Rmd

We currently have 7 Epiverse-TRACE packages on CRAN:

  • ColOpenData
  • epiCo
  • cleanepi
  • numberize
  • cfr
  • linelist
  • finalsize

In total, Epiverse-TRACE packages on CRAN have been downloaded 29415 times.

Below is a visualization of the breakdown of this grand total by package over time.
